description:
Immerse yourself in the exciting world of "Star Galaxy Academy: Princess Legacy ", a visual novel that will transport you to a distant galaxy and involve you in a story full of mystery, friendship and heroism.

In a remote galaxy, Lira, a young alien with exceptional talent, receives an acceptance letter to attend the prestigious Stellar Academy. This institution is known for bringing together the brightest minds and bravest warriors from across the galaxy, where advanced sciences, sublime arts, and space combat tactics are taught.

As Lira adjusts to her new life at the Academy, she forms an inseparable group of friends who share her aspirations and dreams. However, the harmony of the school and the peace of the galaxy are threatened when they discover a sinister plot that aims to wreak havoc across the known universe.

Characteristics
·Impressive graphics: Immerse yourself in a visually dazzling universe with full-color images.
·Immersive narrative: Enjoy a story rich in details, with unexpected twists and memorable characters.
·Epic soundtrack: Immersive music that will accompany you in every moment of the adventure.

Are you ready to join the Star Academy and be part of this epic adventure?
name: Star Galaxy Academy: Princess Legacy
intro: In a distant galaxy, a young alien named Lira is accepted into the prestigious Star Academy. Lira and her friends must join forces to protect their school and peace in the galaxy.
